summary: ALTHOUGH WE HAVE NOT BEEN INVOLVED IN AN ACCIDENT OURSELVES, I HAVE A 1999 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE AND WOULD LIKE THE SEAT BELTS REPLACED DUE TO THE NUMBER OF FATALITIES AND INJURIES RELATED TO THE GENERATION 3 UNLATCHING PROBLEMS.  I HAVE ONLY ONE CHILD, A 4 YEAR OLD DAUGHTER, AND WOULD BE DEVASTATED IF ANYTHING HAPPENED TO HER THAT COULD HAVE BEEN PREVENTED.  WE SPENT $20,000 ON THIS VEHICLE AND EXPECT IT TO PROTECT OUR FAMILY.         *JB
